name: The Pleasure Principle ReImagined (from the Magritte Reimagined collection)
description: This is a collection that takes the work of surrealist Rene Magritte and reimagines it as photographs. The subjects are replaced with people of color and the inanimate objects are replaced with classic cameras. This is an extremely impactful image for me. It's really speaks to the way we mask ourselves in today's society.
